turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So, it's a conversation about OpenNeoSaves account, okay?”

turns.text: “Okay, so start now.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So, I would like to open a MuleSaves account. Can you help me?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So, what ID do I need to rank?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, perfect. And can I open in a code tweet without a job beat?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, perfect. Do you offer debt cards with this?”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Perfect! So, I want to open a new account now.”

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Here, my documents, it's here, so...”

turns.speaker: learner

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, perfect. So, thank you so much. I think that's it.”

turns.speaker: learner
